scripts.build: echo '🛠️  Building the site' && npx tailwindcss -i src/index.css -o ./src/v.min.css --minify && node scripts/html-minify.js
scripts.postbuild: echo '🪄  Adding magic sause' && rm -rf build 2> /dev/null && mkdir build && mv ./src/v.min.css ./build/v.min.css && mv ./src/index.min.html ./build/index.html && cp -R ./src/i ./build/i && echo '🤩  Completed! See ./build/-folder'
